snippet: Marikina is famed for its cobblers, but after severe storms struck the Philippines last month, it has become famous for its flooding.
abstract: Marikina Journal; Marikina, Philippines, whose homemade shoes are source of local pride, is submerged after a series of storms intensified the usual strong monsoon rains; an estimated two million people have been affected by the flooding, and at least 72 people have been killed since the deluge began in late July.
lead_paragraph: Marikina is famed for its cobblers, but after severe storms struck the Philippines last month, it has become famous for its flooding.

headline.seo: City in Philippines Known for Shoes Is Up to Its Knees in Water
headline.main: In a City Known for Its Shoes, Water Up to Its Knees
headline.print_headline: In a City Known for Its Shoes, Water Up to Its Knees
